Title: Shutdown/Start VMs by tag
Summary: This script shutdowns/starts VMs by a given tag and its value. If you don't have it, you have to create a Credential Asset with the name DefaultAzureCredential in order to access your account. You can know more about this script here: https://www.returngis.net/2016/07/por-que-eti
Author: Gisela Torres
UserTags: Utility, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, PowerShell Workflow
